name: xlsx-renderer
description: Allows render spreadsheet (xlsx) files based on the template supplied by indeed viewModel.
author: Pawe≈Ç Siemienik <npm@siemienik.pl>

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:lib && npm run build:bundle
scripts.format: npm run format:code && npm run format:markdown
scripts.coverageReport: nyc -r lcov -r=text -r=text-summary  -r=json -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register tests/**/*.test.ts tests/**/**/*.test.ts && nyc report && cp coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/coverage.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
